verses.verse: The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> from Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> to Bochim. <S%H1066><s%> He said, <S%H559><s%> "I made you to go up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and have brought <S%H935><s%> you to the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers; <S%H1><s%> and I said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5769><s%> 'I will never break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant with you: <S%H1285><s%>

and you shall make <S%H3772><s%> no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this land; <S%H776><s%> you shall break down <S%H5422><s%> their altars. <S%H4196><s%>' But you have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to my voice: <S%H6963><s%> why have you done this? <S%H6213><s%>

Therefore I also said, <S%H559><s%> I will not drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H6654><s%> but they shall be in your sides, and their gods <S%H430><s%> shall be a snare to you. <S%H4170><s%>"

It happened, <S%H4397><s%> when the angel of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> to all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their voice, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>
They called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Bochim: <S%H1066><s%> and they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> there to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Now when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had sent the people <S%H5971><s%> away, <S%H7971><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> who outlived <S%H3117><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> who had seen <S%H7200><s%> all the great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> that he had worked <S%H6213><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> being one hundred <S%H3967><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H1121><s%>

They buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the border <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnath Heres, <S%H669><s%> in the hill country of Ephraim, on the north of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Gaash. <S%H1608><s%>

Also all that generation <S%H1755><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> to their fathers: <S%H1><s%> and there arose <S%H6965><s%> another <S%H312><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H3045><s%> who didn't know Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> nor yet the work <S%H4639><s%> which he had worked <S%H6213><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> the Baals; <S%H1168><s%>

and they forsook <S%H5800><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> who brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and followed <S%H3212><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who were around <S%H5439><s%> them, <S%H7812><s%> and bowed themselves down to them: <S%H3068><s%> and they provoked Yahweh to anger. <S%H3707><s%>
They forsook <S%H5800><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> Baal <S%H1168><s%> and the Ashtaroth. <S%H6252><s%>

The anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of spoilers <S%H8154><s%> who despoiled <S%H8155><s%> them; <S%H4376><s%> and he sold them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> so that they could <S%H3201><s%> not any longer <S%H5750><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Wherever they went out, <S%H3318><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was against them for evil, <S%H7451><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had spoken, <S%H1696><s%> and as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to them: <S%H3966><s%> and they were very distressed. <S%H3334><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> raised up <S%H6965><s%> judges, <S%H8199><s%> who saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those who despoiled them. <S%H8154><s%>

Yet they didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to their judges; <S%H8199><s%> for they played the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> themselves down to them: <S%H5493><s%> they turned aside quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> in which their fathers <S%H1><s%> walked, <S%H1980><s%> obeying <S%H8085><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> They didn't <S%H6213><s%> do so.

When Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> raised <S%H6965><s%> them up judges, <S%H8199><s%> then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was with the judge, <S%H8199><s%> and saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the judge: <S%H8199><s%> for it grieved <S%H5162><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of their groaning <S%H5009><s%> by reason of those who oppressed <S%H3905><s%> them and troubled them. <S%H1766><s%>

But it happened, <S%H8199><s%> when the judge was dead, <S%H4194><s%> that they turned <S%H7725><s%> back, <S%H7843><s%> and dealt more corruptly than their fathers, <S%H1><s%> in following <S%H3212><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them, <S%H7812><s%> and to bow down to them; <S%H5307><s%> they didn't cease from their doings, <S%H4611><s%> nor from their stubborn <S%H7186><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%>

The anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Because this nation <S%H1471><s%> have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> their fathers, <S%H1><s%> and have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to my voice; <S%H6963><s%>

I also will not henceforth <S%H3254><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> any <S%H376><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> them of the nations <S%H1471><s%> that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> when he died; <S%H4191><s%>

that by them I may prove <S%H5254><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whether they will keep <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> therein, <S%H1><s%> as their fathers kept it, <S%H8104><s%> or not."

So Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H3240><s%> those nations, <S%H1471><s%> without <S%H1115><s%> driving them out <S%H3423><s%> hastily; <S%H4118><s%> neither delivered <S%H5414><s%> he them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>
